subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova cruised past Sara Errani on Saturday in Stuttgart to reach her third straight Porsche Grand Prix final. Sharapova will play Ana Ivanovic, who beat Jelena Jankovic.
snippet: Maria Sharapova cruised past Sara Errani on Saturday in Stuttgart to reach her third straight Porsche Grand Prix final. Sharapova will play Ana Ivanovic, who beat Jelena Jankovic.
